ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: We thank ABRC for providing Arabidopsis seeds. We also thank Shigenobu Yoshida ( Ctro) and Akira Tohyama ( Ab) for providing fungal pathogens. We also thank Yoshihiro Inoue for supports on the statistical analyses. This work was supported by Grants-in-Aid for Scientific Research (15H05780, 18H02204, 18H04780, 18K19212) (KAKENHI), by grants from the Project of the NARO Bio-oriented Technology Research Advancement Institution (Research program on development of innovative technology), and by the Asahi Glass Foundation. Work in the PB laboratory was supported by the National Science Centre SONATA BIS Grant (UMO-2012/07/E/NZ2/04098).
